questions.question: Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    “It is a male dominant society that exists in India”
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    “First school of a child is home”
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    “Are the techno schools we get to see today increase children’s pressure?”
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    ” Do sports improve a child’s personality?”
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    “Should we have restrictions on children’s usage of internet?”
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    ”  Telangana to tax vehicles from Andhra, what is your opinion?”

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Indian Government has banned the Nirbhaya documentary. Do you think banning the documentary was right? What is more important- an open discussion about such issues or banning them to protect the image of the country?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:     After six years of trial, finally the Satyam scam accused have been convicted and sentenced to prison. However, a lot of rich and powerful culprits have had an easy way out. Do you think our judicial system is strong enough to punish all the rich and influential culprits?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Our government rewards players who succeed. But forgets to encourage players who have the potential to succeed. Do you agree?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is Swatch Bharat Programme a success?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Why does India have a problematic relationship with almost all its neighbours?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:       Will the â€˜Make in India’ boost our economy or will it discourage foreign trade?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Traditional classroom teaching methodology vs e-learning
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:     Is money the biggest motivator for employees?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should social service be a compulsory part of our education system?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Who is responsible for eve teasing- boy or girl?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should government take responsibility for problems in agriculture sector given that nature too has a major role in it?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    IPL is a dirty mix of sport and money.
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Morals and values don’t allow us to succeed in work life?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Delhi Government has decided not to allow media in to their assembly. Do you support this move?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Has health care system in India improved?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should the government regulate fees in private schools and colleges?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should Indian government ban cosmetics to encourage use of traditional beauty products such as Shikakai, haldi etc..?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is Ayurveda better than Allopathy?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    People are being recruited to settle on Mars. Do you think it is a good idea to step on other planets and destroy them just like earth?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    All Indians celebrated the success of Mangalyaan. Should crores of rupees be spent on space exploration why millions are hungry on earth?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Safety standards are important when building people's homes. Who should be responsible for enforcing strict building codes - the government or the people who build the homes?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is it right to penalize or punish doctors for failed surgeries and treatments?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Are there good movies and bad movies? Or just hit movies and flop movies?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Do you think it was right for Salman Khan to be given bail immediately after he was convicted?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    In most developed countries, the government takes care of the elderly. Who should be responsible for taking care of our senior citizens â€“ the government or the family?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Keeping animals in Zoo is cruel. Do you agree?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is wisdom a result of one’s efforts or one’s environment?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    What should be the main motive of corporate companies-making more money or, serving the interests of its employees?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is internet bringing people closer, or is it driving us farther away from each other?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    What should university education focus on-giving them vocational skills  for successful career, or giving them values to become good persons?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Given the lack of skilled human recourses, should government increase the retirement age?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should students be allowed to cell phone in schools?

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should people living in apartments be allowed to keep pets? Isn’t it animal cruelty to confine them to such small places?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should people get license to become parents?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should female labourers in India be given the same wages as the male labourers?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should we legalise sports betting?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should English be made the only official language in India to erase language and regional barriers?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Now-a-days breadth of knowledge is more important than depth of knowledge
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should we ban dynastic politics in India?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should we ban pizzas and burgers in India?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should common people be encouraged to have plastic surgeries?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Is being fair same as being beautiful?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    Should we allow NRIs and people of Indian Origin to vote in our elections?
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words:    All mothers should be obliged to stay at home and care for their children. Do you agree?
